name: redukit
description: A redux kit that supports async action and many more

scripts.git:push: git add package.json && git commit -m "release-published" && git push origin
scripts.pub:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && npm run git:push
scripts.pub:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && npm run git:push
scripts.pub:major: npm version major && npm publish && npm run git:push
